content: The Scorpionlord is an optional Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. The leader of a gang of insect guai that have taken over Purple Cloud Mountain, he can only be reached by entering a secret area.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'The_Scorpionlord.md', within the main section titled 'The Scorpionlord'.
The content is as follows:
The Scorpionlord is an optional Yaoguai King boss fight that you can encounter in Chapter 4 of Black Myth Wukong. The leader of a gang of insect guai that have taken over Purple Cloud Mountain, he can only be reached by entering a secret area.
